channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Fed's rate cut rationale
item.description: The job market is worse than it looks. Tariffs' effects on inflation are probably a one-time bump. The big picture: Those two sentences, in a nutshell...

item.title: Trump cancels meeting with top Democrats as shutdown looms
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday said he was cancelling a meeting with top congressional Democrats scheduled for later this week to negotiate on government ...

item.title: These Black cities cut crime. Mayors fear Trump's moves could undo the progress.
item.description: Violent crime is falling in some majority-Black U.S. communities even as mayors warn that President Trump 's cuts to prevention programs and threats o...

item.title: Trump's middle finger to the UN: "Your countries are going to hell"
item.description: President Trump had a harsh message for fellow world leaders at the UN General Assembly today: "Your countries are going to hell!" Why it matters: In ...

item.title: Sinclair, Nexstar won't broadcast Kimmel's show despite it returning to ABC
item.description: Sinclair plans to continue pre-empting " Jimmy Kimmel Live ," despite the fact that ABC said it plans to bring back the program on Tuesday. Why it mat...

item.title: Trump says he has ‘solved’ 7 conflicts. Here’s what to know about them.
Trump upbraids U.N. in speech, claiming ‘your countries are going to hell’
item.description: Trump blasted the U.N. for its focus on migration and climate change, calling global warming a “con job.”

item.title: Trump’s U.S. attorney pick could put him on collision course with Senate
item.description: It’s unclear whether Virginia’s Democratic senators will support Lindsay Halligan if her nomination as U.S. attorney comes before the Senate.

item.title: Following his remarks to the U.N. General Assembly — in which he heavily criticized the organization...
Trump says United Nations is not living up to its potential as he addresses organization
item.description: Trump is addressing world leaders as he struggles to broker peace in Russia’s war with Ukraine and Israel’s war in Gaza.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
